physicalTable.name: SAMP_LOOKUPS_D
physicalTable.description: Lookups dimension table : Stores lookup information for various dimension attributes in different languages

physicalColumns.name: Lookup_Dsc
physicalColumns.description: Lookup Description: Stores the description of a dimension attribute in a specific language

physicalColumns.name: Lookup_Type
physicalColumns.description: Lookup Type: Stores the name of the dimension attribute. Some possible values are 'Marital Status', 'Customer Type' and so on.

physicalColumns.name: Language_Key
physicalColumns.description: Language Key: Stores the language information in short form like 'en', 'fr', 'es' and so on.

physicalColumns.name: Lookup_Key
physicalColumns.description: Lookup Key: Stores the key value of a dimension attribute in a specific language
